import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import CodeField from '../../EditCode/EditorDeCodigo/CodeField'; import { AiFillHeart, AiFillMessage } from "react-icons/ai"; import hljs from 'highlight.js' import './style.scss'; import '../../EditCode/EditorDeCodigo/highlight.css' import ConfProject from '../../../contexts/ConfProject'; function Project({ nome, descricao, color, code }) { const { codeEditRef } = useContext(ConfProject) useEffect(() => { const codeArea = codeEditRef.current.lastChild.lastChild hljs.highlightBlock(codeArea) }) return (

{nome}

{descricao}

99
99
@Mateus
); } export default Project
